name: AMERICAN RENAL ASSOCIATES
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Issues pertaining to access to, coverage of, an reimbursement for kidney care.
Issues pertaining to access to, coverage of, and reimbursement for dialysis services and kidney care; administrative proposals for new value-based purchasing models for dialysis services.
Issues pertaining to access to, coverage of, and reimbursement for kidney care; including charitable premium assistance, kidney disease education, and anti-kick back issues.

Issues pertaining to access to, coverage of, and reimbursement for dialysis services and kidney care; administrative proposals for new value-based purchasing models for dialysis services, and COVID-19
